decision_conditions: The proposed development by reason of its  siting, scale and design, would fail to appear subordinate  or proportionate to the host dwelling and would unduly erode the gap to no 36 Cranes Park Avenue resulting in an unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the   host dwelling, streetscene and the area . The proposal is therefore contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021)  and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy Policy DM10 (2012) and the Residential Design Guidance  SPD (2013).

By reason it its siting and  depth, the proposed development would have an overbearing impact on the neighbouring properties at nos 36 and 40 Cranes Park Avenue and therefore be contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan  (2021) , Policies CS8 and DM10 in the Core Strategy (2012)and the Residential Design Guidance  SPD (2013).
description: Erection of part single/part two storey side and rear extension. Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2nos. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
